subject: Relationships
title: Eye Contact: The Intimacy Accelerator
description: Learn Eye Contact: The Intimacy Accelerator in one minute.

hook.text: Psychologist Arthur Aron made strangers fall in love in a lab ‚Äî using 36 questions and four minutes of eye contact.

buildup.text: Sustained eye contact triggers oxytocin release and activates brain regions associated with reward and bonding.

discovery.text: Couples in love synchronize their blink rates unconsciously. Their eyes literally dance together.

twist.text: Too much eye contact from a stranger feels threatening. Context determines whether a gaze is intimate or hostile.

climax.text: Eye contact is the most powerful nonverbal tool. Two seconds of it can change a stranger into someone familiar.

punchline.text: Four minutes of eye contact can turn strangers into lovers.

quiz.question: What did Arthur Aron's eye contact experiment demonstrate?
options: Sustained eye contact can create deep intimacy rapidly
